text: • [[b]] Qiang Sway[[/b]] is a resource shared among the Qiang factions, that allows for usage in assignments.

[[b]]Hoarder of Ways[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Spear Infantry[[/col]]\\n\\nAvailable for characters rank 3 or higher\\n\\nRole: Frontline\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Bonus against Cavalry\\n[[col:red]]-[[/col]] Raiders\\n

[[b]]Hoarder of Sources[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Ranged Infantry[[/col]]\\n\\nAvailable for characters rank 6 or higher\\n\\nRole: Bombardment\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Oil Arrows\\n[[col:red]]-[[/col]] Weak against Cavalry\\n
